name: Product Designer / Portfolio
description:
¡Hola!


There are plenty ways to show your works and skills as a Product Designer: Behance, Medium, personal website.


And that’s a point where you could face a dilemma: put enormous amount of time & money in building your own web platform with case studies (which you probably need once a year or two when you are hiring) or just operate with your work projects in Figma.


I tried to combine both paths in a third way — web Figma portfolio that I believe has a number of benefits:

  • Easy to update
  • Costs you nothing
  • Shows your skills from the start
  • Perfect for showcasing Figma projects


Hope it would be helpful.


P.S.

Please support Ukrainian people as you can: retweets, kind words and of course donations
